DataElement.preferredName: Non-Enhancing Lesion RANO Criteria T2 and FLAIR MRI Change Evaluation Result
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to indicate the change status of non-enhancing lesions by Response Assessment in Neuro-Oncology criteria (RANO) measured using T2 and Fluid Attenuated Inversion Recovery MRI.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Non-Contrast Enhancing Tissue Response Assessment in Neuro-Oncology Criteria T2 and Fluid Attenuated Inversion Recovery MRI Change Evaluation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Visibly abnormal tissue on a magnetic resonance image (MRI) or computed tomography (CT) that does not enhance with contrast and is not edema._An update to the MacDonald criteria for assessing disease progression and treatment response in glioblastoma multiforme (GBM)._A magnetic resonance imaging modality that uses an inversion-recovery pulse sequence to nullify the signal from fluids._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Visibly abnormal tissue on a magnetic resonance image (MRI) or computed tomography (CT) that does not enhance with contrast and is not edema.

Concepts.definition: Visibly abnormal tissue on a magnetic resonance image (MRI) or computed tomography (CT) that does not enhance with contrast and is not edema.

Property.preferredName: Response Assessment in Neuro-Oncology Criteria T2 and Fluid Attenuated Inversion Recovery MRI Change Evaluation
Property.preferredDefinition: An update to the MacDonald criteria for assessing disease progression and treatment response in glioblastoma multiforme (GBM).:A magnetic resonance imaging modality that uses an inversion-recovery pulse sequence to nullify the signal from fluids.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

Concepts.definition: An update to the MacDonald criteria for assessing disease progression and treatment response in glioblastoma multiforme (GBM).

Concepts.longName: T2 and Fluid Attenuated Inversion Recovery MRI
Concepts.definition: A magnetic resonance imaging modality that uses an inversion-recovery pulse sequence to nullify the signal from fluids.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time._The result of an action.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Stable; subject to little fluctuation; showing little if any change.

Concepts.definition: Subject to little fluctuation; showing little if any change.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Made less in size or amount or degree.

Concepts.definition: Made less in size or amount or degree.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Changed concept definition to match current NCIt. mc 4/13/17

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A process of becoming larger, more numerous, more important, or more likely.

Concepts.definition: A process of becoming larger, more numerous, more important, or more likely.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A starting point to which things may be compared.
